title: Fuel Cell Optimization Platform
description: A full-stack application for simulating and optimizing fuel cell performance with an interactive dashboard for visualizing results.

title: AI-Powered Study Tool
description: An intelligent application that uses natural language processing to generate practice questions and provide personalized learning recommendations.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A complete e-commerce solution with product listings, shopping cart functionality, user authentication, and payment processing.

title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
description: A dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with customizable charts, filters, and real-time updates.

title: Neural Network from Scratch
description: A neural network implementation built from scratch using only NumPy, with visualizations to explain the underlying concepts.

title: Algorithm Visualizer
description: An interactive web application that visualizes various algorithms including sorting, pathfinding, and graph algorithms.
